sentences.en: A proclamation was soon issued to forbid the action upon pain of death.
sentences.cn: 过了不久就有告示禁止这种行为,违者处死.

sentences.en: Allied aircraft dropped leaflets of this proclamation over Rome and other Italian cities on July 17.
sentences.cn: 7月17日,盟国的飞机在罗马和意大利的其他城市上空,散发了这一文告的传单.

sentences.en: An official or authoritarian declaration a proclamation or an edict.
sentences.cn: 宣言,公告官方或权威性的宣布;公告或法令.

sentences.en: Chueh - hsin saw the proclamation posted on the streets, and he told Chueh - hui about it.
sentences.cn: 这个布告觉民在街上也看见过.
它将于正式宣告时合法.

sentences.en: Proclamation from our Xuzhongnese : We endeavoring for advancing everyday!
sentences.cn: 旭众人的宣言: 我们每天追求进步.

sentences.en: The authorities issued a proclamation forbidding public meetings.
sentences.cn: 当局发布了公告，禁止公开集会。

sentences.en: The patent right will become effective from the date of authorization proclamation.
sentences.cn: 专利权自授权公告之日起生效.

sentences.en: There is a royal proclamation of the birth of the prince.
sentences.cn: 那有一张王室的公告,宣告王子诞生了.

sentences.en: This is the general rule to be observed without special proclamation.
sentences.cn: 此为一般规则,无须特别宣告.

sentences.en: This proclamation is hereby issued in allsincerity and earnestness.

words.tran_cn: 宣告，公布；声明；表明；赞扬

trans.tran_cn: 宣布，公布，公告，布告，宣言书
